title: Amazon discounts Apple Studio Display to $1,299 to pair with new Mac deals
description: Amazon has introduced a fresh price drop on the Apple Studio Display for February, along with steeper price cuts on MacBooks and the M4 Mac mini that deliver up to $410 off.Save $300 on the Apple Studio Display.Expanding your screen real estate just got a little cheaper thanks to Amazon's $300 price cut on the Apple Studio Display. Pick up the 27-inch 5K Retina display for as low as $1,299.99. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Amazon has introduced a fresh price drop on the Apple Studio Display for February, along with steeper price cuts on MacBooks and the M4 Mac mini that deliver up to $410 off.
text: Amazon has introduced a fresh price drop on the Apple Studio Display for February, along with steeper price cuts on MacBooks and the M4 Mac mini that deliver up to $410 off. February Apple sale at AmazonExpanding your screen real estate just got a little cheaper thanks to Amazon's $300 price cut on the Apple Studio Display. Pick up the 27-inch 5K Retina display for as low as $1,299.99. Buy for $1,299.99 The triple-digit discount applies to multiple Apple Studio Display models, including nano-texture options, that pair well with the MacBook and Mac mini deals in effect at Apple resellers this weekend. Here's a rundown of the top offers: Apple Studio Display deals Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, Tilt-Adjustable Stand: $1,299.99 ($300 off) Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, VESA Mount Adapter: $1,299.99 ($300 off) Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, Tilt-and-Height Adjustable Stand: $1,699.99 ($300 off) Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, Tilt-Adjustable Stand: $1,599.99 ($300 off) Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, VESA Mount Adapter: $1,599.99 ($300 off) Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, Tilt-and-Height Adjustable Stand: $1,999.99 ($300 off) MacBook Air 13-inch discounts 13" M2, 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $799 ($200 off) 13" M3, 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $899 ($200 off) with on-page coupon 13" M3, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,099.99 ($200 off) 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $1,189 ($110 off) 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299.99 ($200 off) with on-page coupon Grab discounts on every config in our 13-inch MacBook Air M3 Price Guide and 15-inch MacBook Air M3 Price Guide. MacBook Pros on sale 14-inch M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,397 ($202 off) 14-inch M4, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,589 ($210 off) 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB, Silver: $1,749 ($250 off) 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 1TB: $2,169 ($230 off) 14-inch M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,889 ($310 off) 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,239 ($260 off) 16-inch M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $3,139 ($360 off) 16-inch M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB: $3,589 ($410 off) Find deals on every spec in our 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide. html:
Amazon has introduced a fresh price drop on the Apple Studio Display for February, along with steeper price cuts on MacBooks and the M4 Mac mini that deliver up to $410 off.

February Apple sale at Amazon

Expanding your screen real estate just got a little cheaper thanks to Amazon's $300 price cut on the Apple Studio Display. Pick up the 27-inch 5K Retina display for as low as $1,299.99.

Buy for $1,299.99

The triple-digit discount applies to multiple Apple Studio Display models, including nano-texture options, that pair well with the MacBook and Mac mini deals in effect at Apple resellers this weekend. Here's a rundown of the top offers:

Apple Studio Display deals

  • Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, Tilt-Adjustable Stand: $1,299.99 ($300 off)
  • Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, VESA Mount Adapter: $1,299.99 ($300 off)
  • Apple Studio Display Standard Glass, Tilt-and-Height Adjustable Stand: $1,699.99 ($300 off)
  • Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, Tilt-Adjustable Stand: $1,599.99 ($300 off)
  • Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, VESA Mount Adapter: $1,599.99 ($300 off)
  • Apple Studio Display Nano-Texture Glass, Tilt-and-Height Adjustable Stand: $1,999.99 ($300 off)

MacBook Air 13-inch discounts

  • 13" M2, 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $799 ($200 off)
  • 13" M3, 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $899 ($200 off) with on-page coupon
  • 13" M3, 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,099.99 ($200 off)
  • 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $1,189 ($110 off)
  • 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299.99 ($200 off) with on-page coupon
    • Grab discounts on every config in our 13-inch MacBook Air M3 Price Guide and 15-inch MacBook Air M3 Price Guide.

MacBook Pros on sale

  • 14-inch M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,397 ($202 off)
  • 14-inch M4, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $1,589 ($210 off)
  • 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB, Silver: $1,749 ($250 off)
  • 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 1TB: $2,169 ($230 off)
  • 14-inch M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,889 ($310 off)
  • 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,239 ($260 off)
  • 16-inch M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $3,139 ($360 off)
  • 16-inch M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB: $3,589 ($410 off)
    • Find deals on every spec in our 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.

Mac mini savings

  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB, 256GB: $529* ($70 off) at B&H
  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB, 512GB: $744 ($55 off)
  • M4, 10C CPU, 10C GPU, 24GB, 256GB: $939 ($60 off)
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $1,279* ($120 off) at B&H
  • M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 1TB: $1,549* ($50 off)
  • M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 1TB: $2,099* ($100 off)
    • B&H prices above need to be activated through the pricing link from a laptop or desktop. Every model is on sale in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide.
